Features.title: Everything you need
Features.subtitle: Powerful features to manage your Steam library like never before

gameSearch.title: Game Search
gameSearch.desc: Search and explore Steam games by App ID or name with lightning-fast results.

gameDetails.title: Game Details
gameDetails.desc: View detailed information including prices, release dates, and complete metadata.

multiplayerDetection.title: Multiplayer Detection
multiplayerDetection.desc: Automatically detect multiplayer and co-op support for any game.
